Text: Don’t forget: it was your calls, letters, and action that stopped Republicans from repealing the Affordable Care Act, saving health insurance coverage for tens of millions of Americans. Let’s stop this tax bill: (202) 224-3121.

Who are some of the people the Senate GOP tax scam would hurt?
 Seniors who rely on Medicare
 13 million more Americans who would be uninsured in the next decade 
 Our children, who would face an increase in the deficit by $1.4 trillion by the year 2027
Tell your representatives at (202) 224-3121 to vote NO on the GOP tax plan. Under this bill, approximately 50 million American households would see a tax increase within a decade.

It is outrageous that protecting our children’s health care hasn’t been a top priority.https://www.washingtonpost.com/national/health-science/states-prepare-to-shut-down-childrens-health-programs-if-congress-doesnt-act/2017/11/23/01a6169e-ba7d-11e7-be94-fabb0f1e9ffb_story.html …

Here’s a suggestion: Instead of giving corporations a big tax cut, let’s give the middle class a real, permanent tax cut.
#NetNeutrality ensures that internet providers can’t tilt the playing field by blocking or throttling their competitors. Protecting the free and open internet is crucial.

Today on the 40th anniversary of Harvey Milk’s historic election as California’s first openly gay official, we must remember his words, “Hope will never be silent.”
The historic wins across the country last night for women, members of the LGBTQ community, people of color, and Americans of every faith, showed our diversity is our strength.
A year ago today, I asked the question, “do we retreat, or do we fight?” From marches to stopping the Affordable Care Act repeal, we did not retreat.
